scripts.package: rm -f elastic.alfredworkflow && npm run babel && rm -fr node_modules && npm install --production && zip -q -X -r elastic.alfredworkflow icon.png index.js info.plist node_modules icon.png logos lib test && npm install
scripts.test: export AVA='alfy-works-with-this-for-tests' && npm run babel && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha
